data.actual_result: Screenshare window starts to shrink dramatically
data.expected_result: Screenshare window should stay at a constant size
data.short_description: Screenshare window shrinks as text is sent in DM/group channel.
data.steps_to_repro: - Call someone or group - Enable screenshare on main monitor - Start typing in channel until text reaches boundary between channel and screenshare window - Analyze - Type a few more lines - Analyze
